title: New: The Acid – Creeper
body:
**The Acid’s** sound has been unsettling since day one.

There’s a certain, bodiless effect that they seem to portray, it’s about as far from the passivity of modern pop music as it possibly could be. New track, _Creeper_, lifted from their debut LP Liminal out on Infectious later in the year has the same sort of vibe that Radiohead’s OK Computer does. At times minimal in sound, but relentless with it’s foreboding, uncompromising atmosphere. There’s an underlying feeling that Creeper could well be part of one of the records of the year. Check it out below.
